item.title: LAMBDA functions - Build your own Excel formulas easily
item.description: You could create your own Excel functions using VBA since long time ago, but there is a new way of creating them: LAMBDA functions. As of today, this option is available for the general public, but this option was only available for Office Insiders participants when this post was released on 2022. The LAMBDA function official documentation is great but let me show you how this works with an actual example.
